ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls (such as Pillsbury® Grands! Big and Flaky)
1 teaspoon yellow mustard, or as needed (Optional)

cookingTips: Unroll crescent dough and cut into thin strips for authentic 'mummy' wrapping appearance
Leave a small unwrapped portion at the top for the hot dog to peek through
Bake at 375°F for 12-15 minutes until golden brown and dough is fully cooked
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user to wrap dough strips creatively and suggest using mustard dots for eyes to enhance the fun presentation.
